title: CJI Sexual Harassment Case: Woman Withdraws From Committee, Citing Unfair Treatment
content:
A woman who accused Chief Justice of India Ranjan Gogoi of sexual harassment has withdrawn from the proceedings of a three-judge committee investigating the allegations. 

The woman claims the committee did not acknowledge the gravity of her complaint, failed to follow proper procedures, and created an environment of fear and anxiety. She alleges the committee denied her requests for legal representation, video recording, and even refused to summon records she requested.

The woman says she feels unable to get justice from the committee and has decided to no longer participate in the proceedings.
author: Sruthisagar Yamunan
